name: Constraint Solver
text: Hints for briefcases are generated procedurally in HintManager.cpp. The manager uses data assets to define Hint types which are built from a series of logic statements: and, If, or, not, is equal, is greater than et al alongside subjects like a safe CaseNumber,  the dangerous case, a liar, a case number, plus more. Where the subjects are chosen to make all Hints true.
